R

removeObject(int) - Method in class application.ConfigCreatorSim
Removes an object from the running simulation
removeObject(int) - Method in class application.ConfigSimulation
Removes an object from the simulation.
Renderer - Class in application
Custom renderer for displaying objects of the type CustomObject to the screen in 3d using OpenGL.
requestVBOUpdate() - Method in class application.Renderer
Requests that the renderer redo its VBO.
reshape(GLAutoDrawable, int, int, int, int) - Method in class application.Renderer
Reshapes the canvas.
rotateAboutPoint(Position, double, double, double) - Method in class application.CustomObject
Rotates the object about a point given an x axis rotation, y axis rotation, z axis rotation and the position of the point relative to the object.
Rotation - Class in application
Stores a rotation in 3d space, made up of an X, Y, and Z axis rotation
run() - Method in class application.ConfigCreatorSim
Runs the the renderer and animator
run() - Method in class application.ConfigSimulation
Runs the config simulation until the renderer it is using closes.
run() - Method in class application.PhysicsSimulation
Runs the simulation until the attached renderer is closed.
runSim(String) - Method in class application.MainSimulation
Reads in the config at the given filepath, imports all the objects needed and starts the physics simulation and renderer.
runSimInConfigMode(String) - Method in class application.ConfigCreatorSim
Runs a sim in config mode (things won't move around unless moved by the gui buttons)
